name: platform-validator
docker_compose_file:
version: '3.8'
services:
  validator:
    image: platform-validator:latest
    ports:
      - '18080:18080'
    environment:
      - VALIDATOR_HOTKEY=${VALIDATOR_HOTKEY}
      - PLATFORM_BASE_API=${PLATFORM_BASE_API}
      - DSTACK_VMM_URL=${DSTACK_VMM_URL}
    volumes:
      - ./config.toml:/app/config.toml:ro
      - ./data:/data
